arts.ttl: The lowdown on Derby 0 Millwall 1 - Lions refusing to let Championship play-off dreams fizzle out
arts.sum: Josh Coburn recovered from seeing his penalty saved to score a 95th-minute winner as Millwall prevailed 1-0 at Derby County. However, back came the on-loan Middlesbrough man in stoppage time to fire home after George Saville’s shot had been saved.

arts.ttl: ‘I hope the fans enjoy their trip home’ - Millwall boss on not letting their season ‘drift’
arts.sum: “We know we’ve got some really difficult fixtures coming up so today, for me, was really important that we got those three points and keep ourselves in touch with the teams above us. It was a vital win for the Lions as it kept them in touch with the Championship play-off places – closing the gap to four points ahead of the 3pm kick-offs.

arts.ttl: Millwall boss reacts to Josh Coburn’s late 95th minute goal in Derby win
arts.sum: The Lions had a chance to win all three points in the 83rd minute when Sondre Langas brought down Josh Coburn. “The keeper made a good save with his feet, we missed a penalty, so we did enough to win the game.

arts.ttl: John Eustace issues Derby County verdict as relegation fears deepen after Millwall heartbreak
arts.sum: Join our Derby County WhatsApp group to get the latest Rams headlines sent straight to your phone. John Eustace felt Derby County did not deserve to lose to Millwall after their relegation fears deepened with a 1-0 defeat at Pride Park.

arts.ttl: Coburn misses pen then nets late Millwall winner
arts.sum: Josh Coburn scored a stoppage-time winner to snatch Millwall a 1-0 victory at Pride Park and plunge Derby deeper into relegation trouble.

arts.ttl: Derby County player ratings v Millwall as late winner shatters Rams hearts amid big David Ozoh worry - Leigh Curtis
arts.sum: Eustace's side eventually started to find some joy in possession 10 minutes before half-time with their best effort coming when Kenzo Goudmijn crossed for Ebou Adams who headed wide of the post. Jacob Widell Zetterstrom then had to come to Derby's rescue to save a penalty from Coburn after he was brought down by Sondre Langas.

arts.ttl: Josh Coburn makes amends for penalty miss by snatching late winner for Millwall
arts.sum: Derby remain rooted in the Championship’s bottom three and have now failed to win or score a goal at home this year..

arts.ttl: John Eustace names Derby County team to face Millwall as changes made
arts.sum: Kenzo Goudmijn, David Ozoh and Kayden Jackson are all restored to the team after the 4-0 hammering at the hands of QPR last Friday. While Eustace named a four-man defence against QPR last week, he could well move to a back three today.

arts.ttl: Derby County v Millwall LIVE updates and team news in John Eustace's first home game in charge
arts.sum: Having been appointed the club's new head coach last Thursday, Eustace will be hoping to crown his return to Pride Park with a much-needed three points that could take Derby out of the bottom three. Kane Wilson (hamstring), Dajaune Brown (hamstring), Corey Blackett-Taylor (hamstring) and Curtis Nelson (knee) are all set to miss the game which kicks off at 12:30pm.

arts.ttl: John Eustace responds as former Arsenal man returns to Derby County 'family'
arts.sum: John Eustace says Derby County will be able to draw on Steve Round's "vast experience and knowledge" after his return to the club's coaching staff. Round has joined the club on a part-time basis until the end of the season after previously serving the Rams as a player and as assistant to Steve McClaren.
